The ban reason for [@Klenny](https://ruqqus.com/@Klenny) says "Epilepsy spam not allowed". So the reason this user was permabanned for "spam" was because the admins are calling all the "schizo" posting spam now. As we know, this is the entire userbase except their discord circlejerk. body:
I don't see that in the ToS unless I'm missing something. I don't see anything about using an non-banned account while another account is banned. 

In fact there's a separate statement regarding Ruqqus taking action on multiple accounts: " Ruqqus LLC reserves the right to take administrative action against all of your accounts in the event of a terms of service violation on any of your accounts."

This would seem to imply having a single account banned does not mean you're not allowed to continue using Ruqqus on a different account. The admins could just ban all the accounts if they chose to. You can't use an alt to bypass "restrictions due to Guild exiles or user blocks" so maybe that's what you're referring to. Ostensibly if this account gets exiled from a guild all my other 10+ accounts shouldn't post there either though there's no way Ruqqus would even know without implementing some pretty anti-privacy features.
body_html:
I don't see that in the ToS unless I'm missing something. I don't see anything about using an non-banned account while another account is banned.

In fact there's a separate statement regarding Ruqqus taking action on multiple accounts: " Ruqqus LLC reserves the right to take administrative action against all of your accounts in the event of a terms of service violation on any of your accounts."

This would seem to imply having a single account banned does not mean you're not allowed to continue using Ruqqus on a different account. The admins could just ban all the accounts if they chose to. You can't use an alt to bypass "restrictions due to Guild exiles or user blocks" so maybe that's what you're referring to. Ostensibly if this account gets exiled from a guild all my other 10+ accounts shouldn't post there either though there's no way Ruqqus would even know without implementing some pretty anti-privacy features.

parent.body: Using alts to get around a temp ban is against ToS
parent.body_html: Using alts to get around a temp ban is against ToS

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/6795/klenvastergan-permanently-suspended

The ban reason for [@Klenny](https://ruqqus.com/@Klenny) says "Epilepsy spam not allowed". So the reason this user was permabanned for "spam" was because the admins are calling all the "schizo" posting spam now. As we know, this is the entire userbase except their discord circlejerk. Since everything can now be twisted to be against the rules, expect your posts to be removed and your accounts and guilds to be banned for being "schizo". So much for free speech. +The_Cabal.

body:
You can't go around limits with multiple accounts

You can't:
1. Go around the siege limit
2. Go around the guild limit
3. Go around bans
4. Go around guilds made a day
5. Go around upvotes/downvotes being 1 per user
6. Go around an exile
7. Go around a block

Those are the only ones I can think of for now, but yes the "can't go around user limits" shouldn't ***have*** to be explained so hard
body_html:
You can't go around limits with multiple accounts

You can't:

  1. Go around the siege limit
  2. Go around the guild limit
  3. Go around bans
  4. Go around guilds made a day
  5. Go around upvotes/downvotes being 1 per user
  6. Go around an exile
  7. Go around a block

Those are the only ones I can think of for now, but yes the "can't go around user limits" shouldn't have to be explained so hard

parent.body:
> It's sad everyone needs to be explained like they're 2 years old

It's sad that I would like to explicitly know which aspects of having multiple accounts constitute "something you're not supposed to go around"? You can't answer that question and apparently neither can the ToS. So I have to guess which aspects of having multiple accounts are bannable and which aren't.
